Virtual Office

Run your business from anywhere

Virtual Offices give you the resources and facilities your business needs to grow quickly and efficiently. Virtual Offices give you a first-class office presence and access to 150+ locations around the world. A Servcorp Virtual Office will double your chances of business success.

See details

Coworking space

World's Best Coworking

The workspace can be used flexibly to suit your working style. Choose from "Hot Desking," where you can freely use seats in a shared space, or "Dedicated Desking," where you can have your own fixed seat. All Servcorp locations are in high-grade buildings with excellent accessibility and locations.

See details

About us

What is a Servcorp's working space?

This is a flexible workspace that can be used to suit your working style. Choose from 'Hot Desking', where you have a seat in a shared space, or 'Dedicated Desking', where you have your own fixed seat. All Servcorp locations are in high-grade buildings with excellent accessibility and locations.

Facilities

It's not just about the workspace

As a Servcorp member, you will have access to all the resources you need to run your business. Experience the Servcorp difference as we have helped businesses all over the world and have been providing services in Japan for over 20 years.

Free Wi-Fi
Print
Free drinks
Exchange sessions
IT Support
Secretarial services
Telephone substitution

See details

Pricing

Fast and secure Wi-Fi, high quality coffee and tea, and the opportunity to meet over 50,000 members

Hot desk

From 25,000 yen per month

This plan is ideal for people who work remotely, or who work in a location-independent way. You can use any seat you like in the shared space.

  • Hours of operation: weekdays 8.30am - 5.30pm *24/7 plan available
  • Free use of seating in the coworking space
  • Lockers available (optional)

Dedicated desk

From 40,000 yen per month

Ideal for those who want the flexibility and benefits of a coworking space but also want to have their own dedicated seating and storage.

  • Available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
  • You will be allocated your own seat
  • Lockable cabinets available

See details

Optional services

Rental address packages

A prestigious address at a Servcorp location can be used as your business address. You can register your company, put it on your corporate brochure or website (subject to availability).

Telephone secretarial package

You will be given your own landline number and your calls will be answered by a dedicated and trained receptionist.

Secretary & IT Support

Business support from our professional secretarial and IT teams is available at a charge based on the time spent. Please contact us for more details.

About Servcorp

Headquartered in Sydney, Australia, Servcorp provides flexible office services including rental offices, co-working spaces, virtual offices and meeting rooms to entrepreneurs, small businesses and multinational corporations.
